http::obsolete_reason

Returns the obsolete reason-phrase text for a status code.

Synopsis

Defined in header <boost/beast/http/status.hpp> 

string_view
obsolete_reason(
    status v);
Description
Parameters

Name

Description

v

The status code to use.
